# Karl Heasman : How Karl sold Cognito Integrated Marketing

If you are thinking of selling your own agency one day, then the story of Karl's sale of Cognito Integrated Marketing is a must listen. Karl managed to achieve a deal seemingly without the burdens and downsides that come along with many sales. Karl now works with other agencies on similar journeys, and shares his experience not jus
